Development environment¶

Archivematica’s development environment and workflows are based on Docker Compose. Docker Compose is the preferred environment for working with Archivematica’s code. Compose can be used in a production environment, but installing Archivematica using Docker is not officially supported for production deployments. When installing for production, Archivematica can be installed using packages or Ansible scripts in either CentOS/Red Hat or Ubuntu environments.

For the latest information on Archivematica’s development workflow based on Docker and Docker Compose, visit the Artefactual Lab > AM Github repository.
